biography.summary: Margaret Wood Hassan is the United States Senator from New Hampshire, serving since 2017. A Democrat, she previously served as Governor of New Hampshire from 2013 to 2015.
biography.education: Educational background details not specified in this record.
biography.career: Career in public service at the state and federal levels.

contact.office_address: 324 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Supports strengthening the Affordable Care Act and expanding access to healthcare.
Advocates for actions to address climate change and promote clean energy.
Supports stronger gun safety laws to reduce gun violence.
Supports comprehensive immigration reform and humane policies.

timeline.event: Sworn in as U.S. Senator for New Hampshire.
